skins.shipDescription: Benson-class Destroyer - Benson, Hull Number DD-421!
skins.selfIntroduction: Here comes Benson! I'm way cooler than Anderson. I'm a capital destroyer, and can move at speeds up to 35 knots! My anti-air defenses are just as impressive. I can't wait for you to see me in battle!
skins.acquisition: Yahoo! Commander! Aren't you charmed by how cute and risqué I am? Huh? W-who am I? ... Hahaha... My name is Benson... It's a pleasure to meet you...
skins.login: Let's hear your excuse for making the strongest and cutest cutie in the world wait for so long, Commander!
skins.details: Stop touching my ears! I told you already, they're real! I-I'll bite you!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'm so cute! The cutest in the universe!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm telling you, Commander, Fletcher's house next door is full of people! Us girls need to help her out every now and then~.
skins.secretaryIdle3: If you don't talk to me enough then I'll stop being a bunny! Woof woof!
skins.secretaryTouch: Whoa! I actually fell asleep! Could this be because of that fabled super hypnosis thing?!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ah, I feel so hot... I'm burning inside!

skins.shipDescription: Fighting for love and peace this Halloween night, it's none other than the pumpkin-style Planet Bunny cutie pie, Benson!
